Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/31st
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Blue Island, Damen, Archer and Ashland due to street blockage near Ashland/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Blue Island, Damen, Archer and Ashland due to street blockage near Ashland/31st.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
